articles.title: Endangered classic Mac plastic color returns as 3D-printer filament - Ars Technica
articles.summary: Endangered classic Mac plastic color returns as 3D-printer filament Mac fan paid $900 to color-match iconic Apple beige-gray "Platinum" plastic for everyone. The Mac SE, released in 1987, was one of many classic Macs to use the "Platinum" color scheme.
